page.title: 12A day in my life
page.content: **************** At 7:00am I got washed and went downstairs to read a computer magazine "Crash". Next I had breakfast, Weetabix , toast and coffee, then it was out to catch the school bus from the Village Green. There we played football until the bell rang, then we went to our tutor rooms for registration. We played cricket in our Physical Education lesson, next we had Maths where we were learning ??????????. Lunch was two sandwiches, a drink, a biscuit and an apple. We then played football until the afternoon school began. We had Chemistry and were learning the elements, then in French we learnt how to buy French food. This brought us to 3:30pm, home on the bus and home for tea, an more football until bedtime at 9:30pm.
